name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and retro console buttons, this robot brings a nostalgic touch to the digital realm. Its arms and legs resemble a playful cat, adding a touch of whimsy to its design. The classic screen displays waveforms and data with precision, while the helmet addon enhances its functionality and protection. RetroCat is a well-rounded robot with a balance of abilities and skills.
